title: List of Chelsea F.C. managers - Wikipedia
snippet: In February 2022, Thomas Tuchel led Chelsea to its first FIFA Club World Cup. He is also the coach who have won the most international titles with the club; all three of his titles were international.

title: Chelsea Coaching Staff - The Chelsea Chronicle
snippet: Photo by Neal Simpson/Sportsphoto/Allstar via Getty Images · Michele De Bernardin has worked together professionally for some time, with the Italian having coached both the academy and first team during four years at Parma with Mareca.
